У Гонконзі поновилися протести: Поліція застосувала сльозогінний газ

02 Nov 2019, 14:28


Сьогодні, 2 листопада, у Гонконзі поновилися антиурядові протести. Для розгону демонстрантів поліція застосувала сльозогінний газ та водомети.

Про це повідомляє інформаційне агентство Reuters.
Зазначається, що поки мирні протестувальники закінчували виготовлення паперових журавликів орігамі в Чатер-Гарден, активісти почали кидати «коктейлі Молотова» на вулиці, перед штаб-квартирами банку HSBC і Банку Китаю у Гонконзі.
«Поліція знову відповіла сльозогінним газом на протестах у 22-гі вихідні поспіль. Пізніше активісти підпалили вхід у Центральну станцію метрополітену, намалювавши графіті на склі та скоївши акт вандалізму на одній зі станцій на заході», – повідомили у виданні.
Крім того, як пише видання, активісти заблокували вулиці і підпалили пластикові барикади, звідки пахне кислотою, і вирвали принаймні дві телефонні будки з землі.
Крім того, повідомляється про щонайменше один «коктейль Молотова», кинутий з боку демонстрантів.
Нагадаємо, у Гонконзі скоїли напад на одного з лідерів протестів, що тривають з початку літа.

5 reasons why the Amazfit Nexo is the best Xiaomi smartwatch
02 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Manu Contreras
Smart watches are already much more than watches that show mobile notifications. They have evolved to be not only a companion of your smartphone, also a fitness information center and a piece of fashion that you wear to your liking. The Amazfit Nexo smartwatch, one of Xiaomi's best smartwatches is this and much more.
Amazfit is one of the brands in which Xiaomi invests, integrated into its ecosystem of connected products. Specifically, this Amazfit Nexo is possibly the best Xiaomi smartwatch that you can buy right now.
This Amazfit Nexo is not only a modern smartwatch with a large screen, it is a tool for people who want to better track their physical health or for those who want to play sports and keep track of their goals.
The best of all is that it is already available in Spain and its price, which is officially € 199 (what it costs on Amazon), although in stores like PcComponentes it is available for somewhat less.
Here are some of the reasons that make it a very special watch.

It has a modern design and is made of very resistant materials



Believe us, the worst thing that can happen to your smartwatch is that it finishes it or that the screen has scratches. That is why the Amazfit Nexo is made of very resistant materials so that it lasts a long time.
Its structure is polished zirconium ceramic for 35 days. This gives it its shine while maintaining its resistance.
The AMOLED screen of 1.39 inches and 326 pixels per inch has an extra protection thanks to the Corning Gorilla Glas glass, which also has a 2.5D effect on the edges.

That the screen is AMOLED will allow you to see all the information of the clock in any situation, even outdoors with direct sunlight, one of the worst situations for a normal screen. The battery will give you about 28 hours of use, enough for a busy day and recharging while you sleep.
The strap is silicone, but thanks to the use of a standard system, you can use virtually any strap you see in stores.
It is a clock with its own SIM card to make calls



With the Amazfit Nexo you can make calls, but we do not talk about it becoming a microphone and speaker of your phone, but that it integrates its own 4G modem and eSIM to be able to have its own number and become independent of your smartphone.
You do not need to insert a plastic card in the watch, thanks to the eSIM technology you can contact your operator and have a code set automatically to connect to 4G networks.
In Spain, the Amazfit Nexo eSIM system is compatible with Movistar and Vodafone. You just have to ask the operator for an eSIM that will double your traditional card to receive calls on your smartphone and smartwatch.
It also has Bluetooth 4.2 and Wi-Fi to connect to your mobile and to your home Wi-Fi network.
